article: a zimbabwean archbishop who was an outspoken critic of his president before becoming embroiled in a sex scandal has resigned , but vowed tuesday to continue championing his countrymen facing political and economic crises .
abstract: zimbabwean archbishop government critic accused of adultery resigns vows not to be silenced
